numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that MLS has the most diversity in coaches.
2. I noticed that the NBA has the most diversity in players.
3. I noticed that the WNBA has the most diversity in players.
4. I wonder why MLB has the least diversity in players.
5. Maybe baseball does not spread the game around the world.
6. Eventually, players in these 5 leagues will be more diverse.
7. Eventually, coaches in these 5 leagues will be more diverse.
8. Some leagues give benefits for hiring a diverse candidate.
9. The headline is: Leagues are becoming more diverse, but is it enough?
